document_data.name: Mintassan the Magnificent
document_data.mainbody: '''Mintassan the Magnificent''' (also known as '''the Sage''' or '''the Mad''') was a [[planewalker]] and [[sage]] of the planes who lived in the city of [[Westgate]].  His sigil was a stylized sideview of a four-legged beast that vaguely resembled the letter 'M'.<ref name="C&D-p158>
document_data.Personality: Whimsical and impulsive, Mintassan loved adventuring.<ref name="C&D-p158>
document_data.Possessions: He was known to have several magical items, including a ''[[staff of the undead]]''.<ref name="C&D-p158>
document_data.History: Mintassan's townhouse was located in the southern section of Westgate on a branch of [[Southgate Market Street]].  The sign out front read "Mintassan's Mysteries: Curios from Very Faraway Places". It was known to be heavily warded.<ref name="C&D-p158>
document_data.Relationships: He was romantically linked with [[Alias]].<ref name="C&D-p158>
